meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Malaysia.
meanings.sent1: In Malaysia, you can use ringgit to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ringgit at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The ringgit in my wallet seemed to be whispering to me to spend it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny ringgit, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ringgit jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.sent1: I found a ringgit on the street and picked it up.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper handed me a few ringgit in change.
meanings.sent3: The ringgit rolled off the table and onto the floor, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a newly minted ringgit, full of value.
meanings.sent5: He held the ringgit in his hand, feeling the weight of his hard work.
